Description.Text: Excellent Serviced Apartments, equipped with every comfort, suitable for people travelling for leisure, great for families and friends travelling together or when travelling for business too, which gives you total flexibility for meetings and to invite anyone. Ideally located with easy access to all London sights and West End. (0710AB)

Located a short walk from Hammersmith Underground Station (Piccadilly, District and Hammersmith and City Lines) a few stops away from South Kensington (National Science and History Museums) and Knightsbridge (Harrods) on the same line to Heathrow Airport.

All apartments are individually furnished and designed. All Apartments are equipped with the following features: LCD TV, DVD players, WIFI Internet Service and all have a fully equipped Kitchenette. Other amenities include the following: Egyptian cotton linen, In room safe, Fine goose down duvet, Hair dryer, iron and ironing board. Bedding configuration is: 1 Double bed plus 1 Sofa bed.
This property does not have a restaurant, but you have numerous restaurants in this lively part of London.

Message.Text:
Essential Information: Room 1

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Hotel Tariff Notes: No show and early departure will be subjected to 100% charge. No date, name and room change allowed. Bookings including children will be based on sharing parents bedding, no separate bed for children is provided unless otherwise stated.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information:
Early departure fee may apply Applicable from 27/Feb/2017 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information:
Early departure fee may apply Applicable from 27/Feb/2017 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information:
Upon check-in guests will be required to leave a £100 deposit either by pre-authorising their card or by cash
No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information:
Upon check-in guests will be required to leave a £100 deposit either by pre-authorising their card or by cash
No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

PLEASE NOTE THE HOTEL CANNOT BE HELD RESPONSIBLE FOR LOSS, DAMAGE OR THEFT OF CASH, JEWELLERY OR OTHER VALUABLES LEFT INATTENDED IN GUEST APART/ROOMS. SAFE DEPOSIT BOXES ARE AVAILABLE AT THE FONT DESK FOR THE SAFEKEEPING OF THESE ITEMS. LOST PROPERTIES: THE HOTEL WILL KEEP LEFT ITEM ON-SITE FOR THE PERIOD OF 2 WEEKS. AFTER THAT TIME IF THE GUEST DO NOT CLAIM THE LEFT PROPERTY IT WILL BE DISPOSED. POR FAVOR, TENGA EN CUENTA QUE EL HOTEL NO PUEDE SER RESPONSABLE POR PERDIDAS,DA¥OS O DINERO EN EFECTIVO ROBADO, JOYERIA U OTROS OBJETOS DE VALOR DESATENDIDOS EN APART/HABITACIONES DE HUESPEDES. HAY CAJAS DE SEGURIDAD DISPONIBLES EN RECEPCION. OBJETOS PERDIDOS: SE GUARDARAN DURANTE 2 SEMANAS Y, SI NO SE RECLAMAN, SERAN DESECHADOS POR EL HOTEL.

³ID POLICY: FOR SECURITY PURPOSES, GUEST MUST PROVIDE WITH A PHOTO ID. ³FRAUD POLICY: THE CREDIT CARD USED TO MAKE THE BOOKING MUST BE PRESENTED AT ³CHECK IN TO VERIFY IDENTITY, ALONG WITH PHOTO ID. THE CREDIT CARD HOLDER ³SHOULD BE PRESENT AT CHECK IN TIME. OTHERWISE, A THIRD PARTY CREDIT CARD FORM³SHOULD BE REQUESTED, FILLED AND SENT/EMAILED BACK PRIOR TO GUEST ARRIVAL. THE³HOTEL MAY KINDLY REFUSE CHECK IN WITH NO REFUNDS IF NOT ADHERED. ³POR RAZONES DE SEGURIDAD, LOS HUESPEDES DEBERAN PRESENTAR UN DOCUMENTO DE ³IDENTIDAD CON FOTO (PASAPORTE O DNI). ³EL PROPIETARIO DE LA TARJETA DE CREDITO USADA PARA LA RESERVA DEBERA ESTAR ³PRESENTE DURANTE EL CHECK IN O RELLENAR UN FORMULARIO EN EL QUE DA SU ³CONSENTIMIENTO, SI NO LOS HUESPEDES PODRIAN SER RECHADOS SIN REEMBOLSO.

AGE POLICY: ALL GUESTS MUST BE OVER AGE OF 18 TO CHECK IN. FOR ALL UNDER 18, ³THEY SHOULD BE ACCOMPANIED EITHER BY A GUARDIAN OR A PARENT. ³POLITICA EDAD: TODOS LOS HUESPEDES DEBEN TENER AL MENOS 18 A¥OS PARA HACER EL³CHECK IN. LOS MENORES DE EDAD DEBERAN ESTAR ACOMPA¥ADOS POR UN GUARDIAN O ³FAMILIAR.

NO SMOKING POLICY THROUGHOUT THEIR APARTMENTS/ROOMS. GUESTS COULD FACE A FIXED³ PENALTY NOTICE OF 50GBP OR A FINE OF UP TO 250GBP. DESIGNATED SMOKING AREAS ³ARE MADE AVAILABLE AT EACH SO PROPERTY. ³NO SE PERMITE FUMAR EN NINGUN APARTAMENTO/HABITACION. LOS HUESPEDES PODRIAN ³ENFRENTARSE A MULTAS ENTRE 50 Y 250 LIBRAS. TODAS LAS PROPIEDADES DE LA CADEN³ SO TIENEN AREAS DISPONIBLES PARA ESTE PROPOSITO.

DEPOSITO DE SEGURIDAD: TODOS LOS CLIENTES TENDRAN QUE APORTAR UNA TARJETA ³DE CREDITO VALIDA A SU NOMBRE A FIN DE BLOQUEAR UN DEPOSITO EN EL CHECK IN. ³SI EL CLIENTE NO LA PRESENTASE, SU RESERVA PODRIA SER CANCELADA SIN DERECHO A³REEMBOLSO. ESTE DEPOSITO ESTARA SUJETO A INSPECCION A LA SALIDA DEL CLIENTE. ³EL DEPOSITO SOLAMENTE PODRA SER DESBLOQUEADO POR EL PROPIETARIO DE LA TARJETA³PARA UN REEMBOSO INMEDIATE DURANTE EL CHECK OUT, CONSULTE LA LISTA DETALLADA ³QUE SE ENCUENTRA EN SU HABITACION/APARTAMENTO O PREGUNTE EN RECEPCION.

PARTY POLICY --> HOTEL REGRET TO INFORM THAT RESERVATIONS FOR STAG OR HEN ³PARTIES WILL NOT BE HONOURED, APARTMENTS/ROOMS WILL BE SUBJECT TO A ³CANCELLATION WITH NO REFUNDS. ³SPECIAL REQUESTS --> ARE SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY AND ADDITIONAL CHARGES MAY ³APPLY. ³FIESTAS --> EL HOTEL LAMENTA INFORMAR QUE LAS RESERVAS PARA DESPEDIDAS DE ³SOLTEROS NO ESTAN PERMITIDAS Y QUE LOS APARTAMENTOS/HABITACIONES PODRIAN SER ³CANCELADOS SIN POSIBILIDAD DE RECIBIR EL REEMBOLSO. ³PETICIONES ESPECIALES --> ESTAN SUJETAS A DISPONIBILIDAD Y CARGOS ADICIONALES³PODRIAN SER APLICADOS.

SECURITY DEPOSIT: ALL BOOKINGS ARE SUBJECT TO CREDIT CARD PRE-AUTHORIZATION ³UPON CHECK IN. BOOKINGS MAY BE CANCELLED WITH NO REFUNDS IF NOT ADHERED. THIS³DEPOSIT-HOLD IS FULLY REFUNDABLE SUBJECT TO APARTMENT/ROOM INSPECTION UPON ³CHECK OUT. THE SECURITY CREDIT CARD PRE-AUTHORIZATION CAN ONLY BE RELEASED BY³THE CARDHOLDER'S BANK/CREDIT CARD ISSUING COMPANY - FOR AN IMMEDIATE RELEASE ³OF THE PRE-AUTHORIZED AMOUNT UPON CHECK OUT, PLEASE REFER TO OUR DETAILED ³POLICY PAGE LEFT INSIDE YOUR APARTMENT/ROOM OR CONTACT THE FRONT DESK FOR ³ASSISTANCE. ALL GUESTS MUST SETTLE ROOM/APARTMENT CHARGE IN FULL PRIOR OR UPO³ CHECK OUT.

Cancelaciones hasta una hora despues de la confirmacion sin gastos. CANCELLATIONS MADE UP TO ONE HOUR AFTER CONFIRMATION, CAN BE MADE FREE OF CHARGE.

PLEASE NOTE THE HOTEL CANNOT BE HELD RESPONSIBLE FOR LOSS, DAMAGE OR THEFT OF CASH, JEWELLERY OR OTHER VALUABLES LEFT INATTENDED IN GUEST APART/ROOMS. AFTER THAT TIME IF THE GUEST DO NOT CLAIM THE LEFT PROPERTY IT WILL BE DISPOSED.
